text: The Szkarpawa (, ) is a distributary river in the Vistula delta of northern Poland. It branches off the Vistula near Drewnica and flows eastward to the Vistula Lagoon at Osłonka. In the past it was known as Wisła Elbląska (English translation: Elbląg Vistula) 0Szkarpawa Category:Rivers of Poland Category:Rivers of Pomeranian Voivodeship
title: Szkarpawa
